title: New Movie Trailer

embed.title: League of Legends Sentinel A Frag Highlight Movie Trailer
embed.description: Trailer for the new League of Legends Movie made by BestFiddleSaturn Made with LSI and Creator Suite and for Sure with League of Legends. Captured the best Moments for an Epic High Skilled Frag Movie, shown in all possible Camera Positions to create an High Level Entertainment Video.

body:
Hey all Together

i made ma new Movie, called "Sentinel". This is the Trailer to it. 

I also wanna get known in the LoL Community. This is my second Movie so i woul appreciate, when you guys (and girls) tell me, if you enjoy watching it or not.

Compliments and Help are welcome.

Greetings

BestFiddleSaturn
